text: Quinestradol (, ) (brand names Colpovis, Colpovister, Pentovis), also known as quinestradiol or quinestriol, as well as estriol 3-cyclopentyl ether (E3CPE), is a synthetic estrogen and estrogen ether which is no longer marketed. It is the 3-cyclopentyl ether of estriol. The medication has been studied in the treatment of stress incontinence in elderly women, with effectiveness observed. ==See also== * List of estrogens * List of estrogen esters § Ethers of steroidal estrogens ==References== Category:Abandoned drugs Category:Cyclopentyl ethers Category:Diols Category:Estranes Category:Estrogen ethers Category:Phenols Category:Synthetic estrogens Category:Triols
title: Quinestradol
